com.tr.karapirinc.comparejson.service

Class DiffService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tr.karapirinc.comparejson.service.DiffService

  • @Service
public class DiffService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service responsible for storing and comparing byte arrays
    Since:
    0.0.1

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiffService

        public DiffService()

    • Method Detail

      • checkDifference

        public CompareJsonResponse checkDifference(long id)
        Evaluates previously saved byte arrays.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id of comparison operation
        Returns:
        result of comparison. EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL_SIZE AND NOT_EQUAL. If result NOT_EQUAL response object CompareJsonResponse contains offsets of differences and length of the data too.

      • getDiffData

        public DiffModel getDiffData(long id)
        Fetches previously saved validated comparison data.
        Parameters:
        id - unique id of comparison operation
        Returns:
        DiffModel
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not data exists with ID

      • compareDiffData

        public CompareJsonResponse compareDiffData(byte[] left,
                                           byte[] right)
        Finds out differences of 2 byte arrays
        Parameters:
        left - byte array to be compared
        right - byte array to be compared
        Returns:
        result of comparison. EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL_SIZE AND NOT_EQUAL. If result NOT_EQUAL response object CompareJsonResponse contains offsets of differences and length of the data too.

      • validateDiffData

        public void validateDiffData(DiffModel diff)
        Validates data for future comparison operations.
        Parameters:
        diff - DiffModel
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If one of the side data is missing in the DiffModel

      • saveDiffSide

        public java.lang.String saveDiffSide(long id,
                                     DiffSide side,
                                     byte[] body)
        Saves or updates comparison data to database
        Parameters:
        id - unique id of comparison operation
        side - Valid side parameter values: enum DiffSide indicates side of the comparison.
        body - byte array data to be compared
        Returns:
        body byte array parameter as String

      • setDiffModelSide

        public void setDiffModelSide(DiffSide side,
                             byte[] body,
                             DiffModel model)
